name: Chaotic (Kofe)
description:
This project is my first game and it is much lower than a beta version.
I'm mainly testing how far I can get using just JavaScript.

This version only contains:

-Basic mechanics of movement.
-Hope.

What comes next:

-Create a room with basic collisions.  Something like a bedroom should suffice for now.

Why upload this so extremely early?

I want to turn this project into a real playable game and to do that I want to get feedback on what you might like in the game.  It should be painfully fun trying to figure out what I need to learn in order to implement a suggestion.

What will happen to the game in the near future?

The purpose is to make an action game with fighting mechanics (including interchangeable abilities), 2.5D perspective and puzzles. The story is still at zero.
If you have any suggestions it is more than welcome.
